name: Nikita Bier
title: Serial App Flipper
archetypeDescription: Has sold more apps to Facebook than most people have downloaded

moves.name: Viral Loop Deploy
moves.effect: App spreads through every high school in America

moves.name: Acqui-hire Bait
moves.effect: Gets bought before having to figure out monetization

moves.name: Gen Z Decoder
moves.effect: Understands what teens want before they do

flavor: The only person who's figured out that the real product is the acquisition, not the app.
bangerQuote: Built two apps, sold both to Big Tech, and made it look easy. The rest of us are just playing checkers.
naturalRival: App Store reviewers and anyone who asks about DAU after month 3
roastBullets: Has a better exit-to-effort ratio than anyone in Silicon Valley history
Builds apps for teens, sells to Facebook, watches them die. Rinse and repeat.
His growth hack is making apps so viral that Big Tech has to buy them to understand young people
The only founder whose business model is literally 'get acquired before we have to make money'
